name: proprioceptive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the nerve endings in the muscles and joints that operate when the body moves, so that a person is aware of their body's position: proprioceptive awareness of the position of one's limbs If you gain or lose weight, your proprioceptive sense actually will change. See
proprioception
More examplesFewer examplesBalance involves proprioceptive information indicating the relative location of muscles and joints. Design of the running shoes is based on your body's proprioceptive abilities.Close-fitting sports clothes improve proprioceptive feedback by enhancing information between body and brain.
